mapper.select: select count(*) num, SUBSTRING(区域, 1, 3) route from dbo . AF001_Plan_Detail t where 项目名称 = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and 提货日期 = #{dateValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and CONVERT(varchar(10), isnull(签收日期, getdate()), 120) > CONVERT(varchar(10), 要求到货日期, 120) group by SUBSTRING(区域, 1, 3)

select CONVERT(varchar(10),t.提货日期, 120) pickDate, t.经销商编码 siteCode, t.经销商名称 siteName, CONVERT(varchar(100),t.要求到货日期, 120) askDate, CONVERT(varchar(100), t.签收日期, 120) arriveDate, (select top(1) isnull(CONVERT(varchar(100), s.SEND_TIME, 120), CONVERT(varchar(100), s.CREATE_TIME, 120)) from dbo . SMPV_SMS_SEND s where s.ORDER_NO = t.运单号 and s.NODES_TYPE in ('3','5')) noticeDate, (SELECT datediff(minute, (select top(1) isnull(CONVERT(varchar(100), s.SEND_TIME, 120), CONVERT(varchar(100), s.CREATE_TIME, 120)) from dbo . SMPV_SMS_SEND s where s.ORDER_NO = t.运单号 and s.NODES_TYPE in ('3','5')), CONVERT(varchar(100), t.签收日期, 120))) sendUseTime, case when CONVERT(varchar(10), isnull(t.签收日期, getdate()), 120) > CONVERT(varchar(10), t.要求到货日期, 120) then '是' else '否' end isLate, case ISNULL(t.破损件数, 0) when 0 then '否' else '是' end isDestroy from dbo . AF001_Plan_Detail t where t.项目名称 = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and t.提货日期 = #{dateValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and SUBSTRING(区域, 1, 3)= #{route,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
